meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ravi Saxena Henry Watkins Andrew Moore Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6633.

td.p: Ravi Saxena, a computer programmer from Chicago, Illinois
Henry Watkins, an actor and comedian originally from Atlanta, Georgia
Andrew Moore, a test prep instructor from Buford, Georgia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $56,802)

tr.td: WHERE ARE YOU FROM?
IN THE SPORTS MOVIE'S CAST
BLANK VERSE
WEIGHTS & MEASURES
GOV.
2 Js
